column3: I'm not sure if I'm reading the code correctly, but it looks like the argument is not ignored. The array is stored in `subtractFeeFromAmount` on line 969, and then used to create the `CRecipient` on line 999, which is eventually passed into `pwalletMain->CreateTransaction`.\n
I'm not sure if I'm reading it correctly either, but this was inspired by /contrib/bitrpc/bitrpc.py sendmany inputs starting on line 251. The 5th, subtractfeefromamount, is ignored.\n
It looks like `bitrpc.py` is just missing the subtractfeefromamount argument. This is an omission in `bitrpc.py`, not a bug in the help dialog.\n
